patthana14.15:4.1: Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:4.2: Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:4.3: Āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.15:5.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:5.2: Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:5.3: Āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.15:6.1: Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:6.2: Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:6.3: Āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana14.15:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
